section.title: Introduction
section.p:
An AccessControllerResolver resolves the appropriate AccessController for a URL.
Lenya ships with the following predefined AccessControllerResolvers:

section.title: PublicationAccessControllerResolver
section.p: The PublicationAccessControllerResolver looks for a config/ac.xconf file inside the publication.

section.title: ConfigurableAccessControllerResolver
section.p: The ConfigurableAccessControllerResolver can be configured with an AccessController directly inside cocoon.xconf:

section.title: ComposableAccessControllerResolver
section.p: The ComposableAccessControllerResolver is configured with a list of AccessControllerResolvers. Each one of these resolvers is invoked until one is successful, i.e. it returns an AccessController.
